channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on NeoTech Club's Blog

item.title: "Introduction to Open Source and Why Privacy Matters" - Meet and Exercises
item.description:
Meet with Hands-on Exercises

This session is about FOSS, OSS, and privacy. This is open for all, and we especially welcome non-technical people!

We will demonstrate the difference between Open Source and Proprietary solutions, explain the challenges, and most importantly, show you how you can get started :D

Bring your laptops and ideas!

  • Venue: üó∫ 202, Sem-5 BCA Classroom, GCC
  • Time: ‚è≤ 1:20PM -> October 17th 2025
  • (with a buffer of 15 minutes for ideas and discussions)

Links:

  • Presentation Slides: https://w3-foss-slides.neotechclub.qzz.io

item.title: Git Workshop 1 - Intro to Git with Github and Codeberg (Instructions)
item.description:
Version control essentials.

From clone to commits, we’ll cover collaborative development workflows. Non-Programmers are also encouraged to join :D

[!TIP] Carry your laptops!
